c74object.name: ears.mc.in~
c74object.digest: Signal input for a patch loaded by ears.process~
c74object.description: Use the ears.mc.in~ object inside a patch loaded by ears.process~ to create a multichannel signal inlet receiving data from an input buffer.

metadatalist.metadata: Andrea Agostini, partly based upon work by Alexander J. Harker

objarg.name: inlet
objarg.description: The number of the inlet of ears.process~ (conted from 1, starting from the leftmost) whose buffer contents are to be passed to ears.mc.in~. It corresponds to the inlet attribute, default is 1.

objarg.name: first_channel
objarg.description: the first channel of the incoming buffer to be passed to ears.process~. It corresponds to the inlet attribute, default is 1.

objarg.name: channels
objarg.description: The number of the output channels, starting from the value of the second argument or the firstchannel attribute, must be passed to ears.process~. It corresponds to the chans attribute. The default is 0, meaning that the all the buffer channels will have be passed, up to a maximum to 1024 (that is, the maximum channel count for a multichannel signal).

attribute.name: chans
attribute.description: Sets how many channels, starting from the value of the firstchannel attribute, must be retrieved from the buffer and output. The default is 0, meaning that the all the buffer channels will be passed, up to a maximum to 1024 (that is, the maximum channel count for a multichannel signal).

attribute.name: firstchannel
attribute.description: Sets the first channel of the incoming buffer.

attribute.name: inlet
attribute.description: Sets the number of the inlet of ears.process~ (conted from 1, starting from the leftmost) whose buffer contents are to be passed to ears.mc.in~.
